label: idValue
comment: The value of the identifier within the scheme. Examplesproduct - 09520123.456788.12345. party - 90664869327. facility - 123.
The registration number or code within the scheme
The registration number or code of this facility, unique within the scheme.
The number of code for this product, unique withing the scheme.

domainIncludes.comment: The ID and Name of an identified entity such qs a product, facility, party, standard, etc
An organisation.  May be a supply chain actor, a certifier, a government agency.
The physical site (eg farm or factory) where the product or materials was produced.
The ProductInformation class encapsulates detailed information regarding a specific product, including its identification details, manufacturer, and other pertinent details.
